property.name: axis_spec
property.description: specs related to each of the measured axes

property.name: bidirectional
property.description: if the axis also measures negative values or not

property.name: safe_overload
property.description: maximum force the sensor withstands safely on this axis, in reference to the max_force value

property.name: max_overload
property.description: maximum force the sensor withstands before total breakdown on this axis, in reference to the max_force value

property.name: min_error_margin
property.description: average error margin while inside the ideal ranges of this axis

property.name: max_error_margin
property.description: average error margin while outside the ideal ranges of this axis
